transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: I am usually red, blue, or white.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on tracks and carry many people. What am I?
I float on water! I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: I can sail on the sea.

transport.question: I can fly high in the sky! I have wings and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: I am bigger than a bird.
I take you to different countries.

transport.question: I am big and yellow! I take children to school. What am I?

hints.text: I stop at corners to collect children
I am longer than a car.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you push me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: You can wear a helmet when you ride me.

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: I have a cross on me.
I take you to the hospital.

transport.question: I have a big bucket and move dirt. What am I?

hints.text: I am used to build things.

transport.question: I fly but not like an airplane. I have a spinning blade on top. What am I?

hints.text: I can go up and down vertically.

transport.question: I am used to carry heavy loads by road. What am I?

hints.text: I have a trailer behind the main cabin

plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Bunnies like to eat me! What am I?
I am tall and have leaves. Birds like to build nests in me! What am I?

hints.text: I stay in the same spot.
Monkeys like to climb me in the jungle.

plant.question: I am a yummy fruit that grows on a tree. I'm red (or green or yellow!) What am I?

hints.text: Doctors say to eat one of me every day!
Snow White ate a poisoned one.

plant.question: I need water and sun to grow. I can be many colors and smell nice. What am I?

hints.text: You can give me to someone you love.

plant.question: I am long and orange. You can eat me as a snack. What am I?

hints.text: Bugs Bunny likes to eat me!

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels love to bury me. What am I?

hints.text: I am a kind of nut.
I fall from trees in the autumn.
Some people are allergic to me.

plant.question: I have a big, round head and grow in the ground. You can make french fries from me. What am I?

hints.text: I am brown on the outside and white or yellow on the inside.

plant.question: I am a tall, green stalk and you eat me like celery. Sometimes I'm pink! What am I?

hints.text: I am a vegetable that's crunchy.
You can bake me in a pie with strawberries.

plant.question: I am a vine, and I grow purple, green, or red berries. You can make juice from me! What am I?

hints.text: You can find me in bunches.
Raisins are dried versions of me.
My plant climbs along a fence.

plant.question: I am a big, hard fruit with a green outside and red or yellow inside. I have black seeds. What am I?

hints.text: I am very refreshing in the summer.
